triples.name: Knowledge base
triples.relevance: Paper proposes software for building and accessing multifunctional knowledge bases.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: Knowledge bases advance artificial intelligence by supporting multiple expert tasks within a domain.

triples.name: Expert system
triples.relevance: Multifunctional knowledge bases reduce brittleness of expert systems by supporting multiple tasks.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: Paper proposes a machine learning program for integrating new information into existing knowledge.

triples.name: Knowledge engineering
triples.relevance: Knowledge engineering tools are necessary for identifying interactions between new and existing knowledge.

triples.name: Question answering
triples.relevance: Paper proposes a question answering system for accessing and retrieving information from the knowledge base.

triples.name: Knowledge representation and reasoning
triples.relevance: Paper proposes a language for representing knowledge as a core component of the system.
